Modifications.Value: Twenty years ago, a military leader named Saint Nicholas miraculously won the battle of Hapstun. Using only a futuristic space-pickaxe and his trademark hat, Nicholas was able to hold off forty Coalition regiments. Today he is honored by this cap.

Twenty years ago, a military leader named Saint Nicholas miraculously won the battle of Hapstun. Using only a futuristic space-pickaxe and his trademark hat, Nicholas was able to hold off forty Coalition regiments. Today he is honored by this cap.
